set.2: Increase final damage by **4.5%**/5.5%/6.5%/7.5% every time you switch to this weapon. Increase frost damage by an additional **3%** for **5** seconds if it's a frost weapon. Only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
set.4: Increase final damage by **6%**/7.5%/9%/10.5% for **4** seconds every time you use Unyielding Wing's discharge skill, stacking up to **2** times. Remove **1** stack when the duration ends. This set effect works in the off-hand slot and the same Matrix's effect cannot be stacked repeatedly. Endurance consumption in the Latent State is reduced by **50%**.
